about.description:
Python-tesseract is a wrapper for Google's Tesseract-OCR Engine.
It is also useful as a stand-alone invocation script to tesseract,
as it can read all image types supported by the Pillow and Leptonica
imaging libraries, including jpeg, png, gif, bmp, tiff, and others.
Additionally, if used as a script, Python-tesseract will print the
recognized text instead of writing it to a file
about.summary: Python-tesseract is an optical character recognition (OCR) tool for python.

about.description:
Python-tesseract is a wrapper for Google's Tesseract-OCR Engine.
It is also useful as a stand-alone invocation script to tesseract,
as it can read all image types supported by the Pillow and Leptonica
imaging libraries, including jpeg, png, gif, bmp, tiff, and others.
Additionally, if used as a script, Python-tesseract will print the
recognized text instead of writing it to a file
about.summary: Python-tesseract is an optical character recognition (OCR) tool for python.

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "pytesseract" %}
{% set version = "0.3.6" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}


source:
  url: https://github.com/madmaze/{{ name }}/archive/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: f6d842c572d15f6b2950156e0f3e6f3666810b887a44de2add0895501c663fc3


build:
  noarch: python
  number: 1
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv
  entry_points:
    - pytesseract = pytesseract.pytesseract:main


requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - pip

  run:
    - python
    - pillow


test:
  requires:
    - flake8
    - pep8-naming
    - flake8-quotes
    - pytest

  imports:
    - PIL
    - PIL.Image
    - pytesseract


about:
  home: https://github.com/madmaze/pytesseract
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_family: Apache
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Python-tesseract is an optical character recognition (OCR) tool for python.

  description: |
    Python-tesseract is a wrapper for Google's Tesseract-OCR Engine.
    It is also useful as a stand-alone invocation script to tesseract,
    as it can read all image types supported by the Pillow and Leptonica
    imaging libraries, including jpeg, png, gif, bmp, tiff, and others.
    Additionally, if used as a script, Python-tesseract will print the
    recognized text instead of writing it to a file


extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - adbeda
    - agcopenhaver
    - int3l
    - oblute
    - rluria14
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.7.10
